name: Create Account
description: Quickly create your Conversegy account to access a suite of AI tools designed to boost your productivity.

name: Sign In with Email and Password
description: Securely log in using your email address and a strong password for safe access to your dashboard.

name: Sign In with Magic Link
description: Easily sign in with a magic link sent directly to your email, eliminating the need for remembering passwords.

name: Sign In with SAML SSO
description: Integrate seamlessly with your organization's Single Sign-On (SSO) using SAML for streamlined access.

name: Directory Sync (SCIM)
description: Synchronize your user directory with Conversegy using SCIM for efficient user management and provisioning.

name: Update Account
description: Manage and update your account settings, preferences, and personal information with ease.

name: Invite Users to the Team
description: Quickly invite team members to join your Conversegy workspace and collaborate on AI-driven projects.

name: Manage Team Members
description: Control team access and permissions, ensuring the right people have the appropriate access levels.

name: Update Team Settings
description: Customize and update your team settings to align with your workflow and project requirements.

name: Webhooks & Events
description: Integrate Conversegy with other tools using webhooks and event-driven triggers for enhanced automation.

name: Create Team
description: Set up and manage multiple teams within Conversegy to organize and streamline your projects effectively.
